      • applyPrimaryActivationUpdate

        protected Future applyPrimaryActivationUpdate(boolean activation)
                                       throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        Overwrite this method to get informed about main function updates.
        Parameters:
        activation - a boolean value which refers to the current function activation.
        Returns:
        should return a future object of the triggered tasks or null if no task was triggered.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - can be thrown if the update fails.
